p: Leachates from each microcosm were collected and 2 hr after the simulated rainfall the bottles were weighed to calculate leachate volume. A subsample of 40 ml for each bottle was stored at −20°C for determination of mineral N (NH 4 +‐N, NO 3 −‐N) and mineral P (PO 4 3−‐P) concentration using a continuous flow autoanalyzer (SKALAR‐SA‐40; Skalar Analytical B.V., Breda, the Netherlands). Mineral N and P losses were calculated by multiplying the concentration of NH 4 +‐N, NO 3 −‐N and PO 4 3−‐P by the volume of leachate.
